pravṛttihetustadyathāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvatsamudayo nirodhaśca bhavatītyetayānupūrvyā saṃkleśavyavadānapravṛtteḥ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba nas kun 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar 'dis mthar gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
siddhihetuḥ pratyakṣopalambhānupalambhasamākhyānasaṃgṛhītaḥ tena sādhyasyāpratītasyārthasya sādhanāt 'grub pa'i rgyu ni mngon sum du dmigs pa dang mi dmigs pa mtshungs pa sro bsnyad pas bsdus pas te /
des bsgrub par ma grags pa'i don sgrub pa'i phyir ro /
phalārthaḥ pañca phalāni 'bras bu'i don ni 'bras bu lnga ste /
vipākaphalaṃ tadyathālayavijñānam rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di lta ste /
kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o /
niṣpandaphalaṃ tadyathā pūrvotpannānāṃ kuśalādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tatsāntānikā uttara kuśalādayo dharmāḥ rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di lta ste /
sdar skyes pa'i dge ba la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi de'i rgyu las byung ba dge ba la sogs pa chos phyi ma rnams so /
adhipatiphalaṃ tadyathā sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ karmādhipatyena bhājanalokaḥ bdag po'i 'bras bu ni 'di lta ste /
sems can thams cad kyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang gis snod kyi 'jig rten no /
puruṣakāraphalaṃ tadyathā sasyādayaḥ visaṃyogaphalaṃ tadyathāryamārgeṇānuśayasamudghātaḥ skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di lta ste /
lo tog la sogs pa'o /
bral ba'i 'bras bu ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi bag la nyal legs par bcom pa'o /
karmārthaḥ pūrvavaddraṣṭavyastadyathā karmasaṃkleśanirdeśe /
yogārthaḥ pañca yogāḥ sāmūhiko yogastadyathā gṛhakāṣṭheṣṭakādīnām 		las kyi don ni 'di lta ste /
las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa bstan pa'o /
ldan pa'i don ni rnam pa lnga ste /
mang po las gyur pa'i ldan pa ni 'di lta ste /
khang pa'i shing dang pha gu la sogs pa'o /
ānubandhiko yogastadyathānuśayādihetuḥ tathāhi tasmin satyasamudācaradbhirapi kleśādibhiryukta ityucyate /
sāmbandhiko yogastadyathā svajanmanāṃ parasparam /
āvasthiko yogastadyathānugrahādyāḥ saṃtānavyavasthāḥ tathāhi tāsu vartamānaḥ sukhena yukto yāvadduḥkhāsukhena yukta ityucyate 		rjes su 'ching ba las gyur pa'i ldan pa ni 'di lta ste /
bag la nyal ba la sogs pa'i rgyu ste /
'di ltar de yod na kun du mi spyod kyang nyon mongs pa sogs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o /
'brel par gyur pa'i ldan pa ni 'di lta ste /
rang gi skye bo rnams phan tshun 'brel pa'o /
gnas skabs las gyur pa'i ldan pa ni 'di lta ste /
phan 'dogs pa la sogs pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyi gnas skabs te; /
'di ltar de'i 'phral du bde ba dang ldan pa nas /
sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i bar du ldan pa zhes bya'o /
'gyur ba las gyur pa'i ldan pa ni 'di lta ste /
vaikāriko yoga āgantukopakleśādika saṃmukhībhāvaḥ tathāhi tasmin sati rāgādibhiḥ śraddhādibhiśca yukta ityucyate glo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa la sogs pa mngon du gyur pa ste /
'di lta ste /
de yod na 'dod chags la sogs pa dang dad pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o /
vṛttyarthaḥ pañca vṛttayaḥ /
lakṣaṇavṛttiḥ saṃskṛtasya trīṇi lakṣaṇānyutpādādīni taiḥ prakārairvartanāt /
avasthānavṛttirādheyasyādhāre vyavasthānam /
viparyāsavṛttiḥ sāṃkleśikānāṃ dharmāṇāmayathābhūtaṃ vartanāt /
aviparyāsavṛttirvyāvadānikānāṃ dharmāṇām 		'jug pa'i don ni 'jug pa lnga ste /
mtshan nyid la 'jug pa ni skye ba la sogs pa 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum ste /
de dag gi rnam par 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
rten la 'jug pa ni rten la gnas par bya ba gnas pa ste /
'di ltar sa la sems can rnams so /
phyin ci log gi 'jug pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams te /
yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin ma yin par 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
phyin ci log ma yin pa'i 'jug pa ni 'phags pa'i lam ste /
de phyin ci ma log par 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
rab tu dbye ba'i 'jug pa ni chos rnams kyi rnam pa tha dad pa gang yin pa ste /
prabhedavṛttiḥ sarvasaṃskārāṇāmatītānāgatapratyutpannādhyātmikabāhyādiprakārairvartanāt 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang nang dang phyi la sogs pa'i rnam par 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
vyākhyāviniścayo yena sūtrāntānāmarthaṃ nirdiśati rnam par bshad pa rnam par des pa ni gang gis mdo sde rnams kyi don ston pa ste /
sa punaḥ parijñeyavastvādīnāṃ ṣaṣṇāmarthānāṃ pratisūtraṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pratipādanāt de yang yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po la sogs pa don drug po dag mdo sde so sor ji ltar mthun mthun du ston pa'i phyir ro /
tatra parijñeyaṃ vastu skandhādi de la yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po ni phung po la sogs pa'o /
parijñeyo 'rtho 'nityatādi yongs su shes par bya ba'i don ni mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa'o /
parijñopaniṣacchīlendriyaguptadvāratādi yongs su shes par bya ba'i rgyu ni tshul khrims dang dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa la sogs pa'o /
parijñā bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ yongs su shes pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so /
parijñāphalaṃ vimuktiḥ /
tatpravedanā vimuktijñānadarśanamiti /
api khalu caturdaśa mukhāni vyākhyāyāḥ 		yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu ni rnam par grol ba'o /
de rab tu shes pa ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'o /
yang rnam par bshad pa'i sgo bcu bzhi ste /
vyākhyāsaṃgrahamukhaṃ yatra sūtrasyotpattiprayojanaṃ padārtho 'nusandhirabhiprāyaścodyaparihāraśca varṇyate /
vastusaṃgrahamukhaṃ yatra sūtramukhaṃ śikṣāryasatyavastvādiṣu pratipādyate 		rnam par bshad pa bsdu ba'i sgo ni gang na mdo sde 'byung ba'i dgos pa dang tshig gi don dang mtshams sbyar ba dang dgongs pa dang brgal ba dang lan brjod pa'o /
dngos po bsdu ba'i sgo ni gang na mdo sde bslab pa dang 'phags pa'i bden pa dang dngos po la sogs par ston pa ste /
'di lta ste /
sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste /
dge ba phun sum tshogs par bya /
rang gi sems ni yongs su 'dul /
tadyathā sarvapāpasyākaraṇamiti gāthā tisraḥ śikṣāmadhikṛtyetyevamādi 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o /
zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa bslab pa gsum gyi dbang du byas pa la sogs pa'o /
aṅgopāṅgamukhaṃ yatraikena padenoddeśaḥ śeṣairnirdeśa iti pradarśyate yan lag dang nye ba'i yan lag gi sgo ni gang du tshig gcig gis bstan pa la lhag ma rnams kyis bshad do zhes rab tu ston pa ste /
tadyathā dvādaśakṣaraṇasaṃnipātadeśanāyāmātmasampatparasampadityanayordvayoryathākramaṃ pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiruttaraiḥ padairnideśa iti /
uttarottaranirhāramukhaṃ yatrottarasyottarasyābhinirharaṇāśrayatvādette dharmā evaṃ deśitā iti pradarśyate /
tadyathā pañcendriyāṇi /
tathāhi śraddadhāno vīryamārabhate ārabdhavīryasya smṛtirupatiṣṭhate upasthitasmṛteścitaṃ samādhīyate samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti /
pratikṣepamukhaṃ yatredamārabhyedaṃ pratikṣipyata iti pradarśyate /
tadyathā vāsyaupamyasūtre āsravakṣayamārabhya catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ pratikṣipyante 		dper na dal 'byor phun sum tshogs pa bcu gnyis bstan pa las bdag phun sum tshogs pa dang gzhan phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di gnyis go rims bzhin du tshig 'og ma lnga lngas bshad pa lta bu ste /
'di lta ste mi nyid dang yul dbus su skyes pa dang dbang po rnams ma tshang ba med pa dang las kyi mtha' smin par ma gyur pa dag gnas su gyur pa la dad pa dang sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba dang dam pa'i chos ston pa dang bstan pa'i chos rnams gnas pa dang gnas pa'i chos rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang gzhan la snying brtse ba'o /
gong nas gong du mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo ni gong du 'og ma ni gong ma la mngon bar bsgrub pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir chos de dag ni de ltar bstan to zhes ston pa'o /
dper na dbang po lnga po rnams te 'di ltar dang na brtson 'grus brtsom mo /
brtson 'grus brtsams na dran pa nye bar gnas so /
dran ba nye bar gnas na sems mnyam par 'jog go /
sems mnyam par bzhag na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so zhes bya'o /
spong ba'i sgo ni 'di las brtsams nas 'di spong bar ston pa ste /
'di lta ste /
ito bāhyaka ihadhārmikaḥ śrutacintāmātrasaṃtuṣṭaḥ bhāvanāyāṃ paritasyamāno 'paripūrṇasaṃbhāraśca /
jānataścāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ paśyataścāsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ vadāmītyevamādinā sūtrakhaṇḍenādyaḥ pudgalaḥ pratikṣiptaḥ 		ste'u yu lta bu'i mdo las zag pa zad pa las brtsams nas 'di las phyi rol pa dang chos 'di ba thos pa dang sems pa tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa dang bsgom pas yongs su yi chad pa dang tshogs yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o /
dge slong dag nga ni shes bzhin mthong bzhin du zag pa rnams zad par smra'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mdo'i tshig gi dum bus dang po'i gang zag spangs so /
bhāvanāyogamanuyuktasyetyevamādinā dvitīyaḥ sgom par sbyor ba la brtson pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa spangs so /
vāsyaupamyadṛṣṭāntena tṛtīyaḥ /
naudṛṣṭāntena caturtha iti 		ste yu'i dpes ni gsum pa spangs so /
gru'i dpas ni bzhi pa spangs so /
akṣarapaṇimamukhaṃ yatrānyasminnarthe prasiddhānyakṣarāṇyanyasmin pariṇāmyante /
tadyathāśraddhaścākṛtajñaśceti gāthāyām 		yi ge yongs su sgyur ba'i sgo ni gang du don gzhan la rab tu grub pa'i yi ge rnams gzhan du yongs su bsgyur ba ste /
dper na mi gang ma dad byas mig za /
zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lta bu'o /
nāśānāśamukhaṃ tatra praṇāho 'praṇāśastadubhayopāyastadubhayaprabhedaśca pradarśyate chud za ba dang chud mi za ba'i sgo ni gang du rab tu chud za ba dang rab tu chud mi za ba dang de gnyi ga'i thabs dang de gnyi ga'i rab tu dbye ba ston pa ste /
tadyathā sujātasūtre praṇāśo bāhyādhyātmikopadhyavasānam dper na legs par skyes kyi mdo las rab tu chud za ba ni phyi dang nang gi rdzas la lhag par chags pa'o /
tatra bāhya upadhirgṛhakalatrādilakṣaṇaḥ ādhyātmikaḥ pañcopādānaskandhalakṣaṇaḥ de la phyi'i rdzas ni khyim dang chung ma la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do /
nang gi rdzas ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid do /
apraṇāśastadubhayādhyavasānavigamaḥ rab tu chud mi za ba ni de gnyi gal lhag par chags pa dang bral ba'o /
praṇāśopāyo 'pravrajanaṃ pravrajitasya cāsravakṣayaṃ prati pramādaḥ rab tu chud za ba'i thabs ni rab tu mi 'byung ba dang rab tu byung nas kyang zag pa zad par bya ba la bag mi byed pa'o /
viparyayādapraṇāśopāyo draṣṭavyaḥ de las bzlog pa ni chud mi za ba'i thabs su blta bar bya'o /
tatrobhayato vatāyaṃ sujātaḥ kulaputraḥ śobhate yacca keśaśmaśrūṇyavahārya yāvat pravrajito yaccāsravāṇāṃ kṣayādyāvatprajānāmītyanenāpraṇāśatadupāyāpadeśena tadviparītalakṣaṇapraṇāśatadupāyau sūcitau bhavataḥ de la kye ma rigs kyi bu legs par skyes 'di ni gnyis kyis mdzes te /
gang skra dang kha sphu bregs nas rab tu byung ba'i bar dang gang zag pa zad nas rab tu shes so zhes bya ba'i bar 'dis chud mi za ba dang de'i thabs nye bar bstan pas de las bzlog pa'i mtshan nyid chud za ba dang de'i thabs bstan par 'gyur ro /
apraṇāśaprabhedo gāthānugītena darśitaḥ "śobhate vata bhikṣurayamupaśānto nirāśrava" iti /
tadevaṃ pravrajanamāsravakṣayaśca paridīpitaḥ /
sa punarāsravakṣayaḥ /
vītarāgo visaṃyukto hyanupādāya nirvṛtaḥ /
dhārayatyanti maṃ dehaṃ jitvā mārasya vāhinīm 		chud mi za bar rab tu dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rab tu bstan pa /
dge slong 'di ni mdzes pa ste /
nye bar zhi zhing zag pa zad /
ces bya ba'o /
de ltar rab tu byung ba dang zag pa zad pa yongs su bstan to /
zag pa zad pa de yang /
'dod chags bral zhing bral ba ste /
nyer len med pas mya ngan 'das /
bdud kyi sde ni pham byas nas /
lus kyi tha ma 'dzin pa yin /
ityanena laukikamārgavairāgyataḥ lokottareṇa mārgeṇāvarabhāgīyasaṃyojanaprahāṇataḥ ūrdhvabhāgīyasaṃyojanaprahāṇataḥ ādhyātmikopadhiprahāṇataśca paridīpitaḥ zhes bya ba ste /
'dis ni 'jig rten pa'i lam la 'dod chags dang bral nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba spangs pa dang gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba yang spangs pa dang nang gi rdzas yongs su spangs par yang bstan pa'o /
hetuphalakṣayādhikārāccāyaṃ nirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ rgyu dang 'bras bu zad pa'i skabs yin pas kyang 'di ba stan par blta'o /
etadviparyayeṇa praṇāśaprabhedaḥ sūcito draṣṭavyaḥ iti 'di las bzlog pa ni rab tu chud za ba'i bar du dbye ba bsnyad par blta bar bya'o /
pudgalavyavasthānamukhaṃ yatreyataḥ pudgalānadhikṛtyedaṃ bhāṣitamiti pradarśyate gang zag rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo ni gang du gang zag 'di snyed kyi dbang du byas nas 'di gsungs so zhes bya bar ston pa ste /
tadyathā audakopame sūtre dvividhau pudgalau tricatuḥprabhedānadhikṛtya bhāṣitam pṛthagjanaṃ dṛṣṭasatyaṃ ca dper na chu las gyur pa lta bu'i mdo las byung ba lta bu ste /
de ni gang zag gnyis dang gsum dang bzhir rab tu dbye ba'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs te /
so so'i skye bo dang bden pa mthong ba'o /
pṛthagjanastribhedaḥ aśuklo 'lpaśuklaḥ bahuśuklaśca /
dṛṣṭasatyaścatuḥprabhedaḥ catvāraḥ pratipannakāḥ catvāraḥ phalasthāḥ trayaḥ śekṣāḥ eko 'śaikṣaḥ 		so so'i skye bo ni gsum du rab tu phye nas bsnyad par blta bar bya ste /
dkar po ma yin pa dang cung zad dkar ba dang cher dkar ba'o /
bden pa mthong ba ni bzhir rab tu dbye ste /
'bras bu la gnas pa bzhi ste /
gsum ni slob pa'o /
gcig ni mi slob pa'o /
prabhedavyavasthānamukhaṃ yatra catuṣkoṭikadibhiḥ praśnairartho varṇyate rab tu dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa'i sgo ni gang du mu bzhi la sogs pa dri ba rnams kyi don brjod pa ste /
tadyathānityasūtre yaḥ sadidaṃ samanupaśyati sarvo 'sau rūpaṃ samanupaśyati yo vā rūpaṃ samanupaśyati sarvaḥ sa sadidaṃ samanupaśyatīti catuṣkoṭikaḥ dper ni mi rtag pa'i mdo las gang gis 'di legs par mthong ba des gzugs thams cad mthong ngam /
gang gis gzugs thams cad mthong ba des thams cad legs par mthong ngam zhes bya ba mu bzhi'o /
prathamā koṭirvedanārdīścaturaḥ skandhānnityaśucisukhātmaviparyāsairasamāropya parijñeyaprahātavyāṃśca samanupaśyataḥ mu dang po ni tshor ba la sogs pa phung po bzhi la rtag pa dang gtsang ba dang bde ba dang bdag tu phyin ci log tu sgro ma btags par yongs su shes par bya ba dang spang bar bya ba yang dag par rjes su blta ba'o /
dvitīyā koṭī rūpaṃ nityaśucisukhātmaviparyāsaiḥ samāropyāparijñeyāprahātavyaṃ ca samanupaśyataḥ mu gnyis pa ni gzugs la rtag pa dang gtsang ba dang bde ba dang bdag tu phyin ci log tu sgro btags nas yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang yongs su spang bar bya ba ma yin par yang dag par rjes su blta ba'o /
tṛtīyā koṭī rūpaṃ nityaśucisukhātmaviparyāsairasamāropya parijñeyaprahātavyāṃśca samanupaśyataḥ caturthīkoṭirvedanādīṃścaturaḥ skandhānnityaśucisukhātmaviparyāsaiḥ samāropyāparijñeyāprahātavyaṃ ca samanupaśyataḥ mu gsum pa ni gzugs la rtag pa dang gtsang ba dang bde ba dang bdag tu phyin ci log tu sgro ma btags par yongs su shes par bya ba dang yongs su spang bar bya ba yang dag par rdzes su blta ba'o /
mu bzhi pa ni tshor ba la sogs pa phung po bzhi la rtag pa dang gtsang ba dang bde ba dang bdag tu phyin ci log tu sgro btags nas yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang spang bar bya ba ma yin par yang dag par rjes su blta ba'o /
yathā rūpe catuṣkoṭika evaṃ vedanādau sarvatra vistareṇa draṣṭavyam gzugs la mu bzhi ji lta ba de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa thams cad la yang rgya cher sbyar bar bya'o /
yāvadyasya kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ sarvaḥ sa nāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāti yāvannāparamasmādbhavaṃ prajānāti sarvasya tasya kṛtaṃ karaṇīyam gang bya ba byas pa de thams cad 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes bya ba yin nam /
gang 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes pa de thams cad bya ba byas pa yin nam zhes bya ba'i bar du'o /
āha catuṣkoṭikam smras pa /
mu bzhi ste /
prathamā koṭiryāvajjīvaṃ sucaritacāriṇaḥ pṛthagjanasya mu dang po ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du legs par spyad pa spyod pa'i so so'i skye bo'i'o /
dvitīyocchedadṛṣṭayādīnām gnyis pa ni chad par lta ba la sogs pa'o /
tṛtīyā aśaikṣasya gsum pa ni mi slob pa'i'o /
caturthī tānākārān sthāpayitvā bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'i'o zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o /
nayamukhaṃ yatra ṣaḍbhirnayairartho varṇyate tattvārthanayena prāptinayena deśanānayenāntadvayavivarjanānayenācintyanayenābhiprāyanayena ca /
eṣāṃ ca ṣaṇṇāṃ nayānāṃ pūrvakāstrayo nayā uttaraistribhirnayairyathākramamanugantavyāḥ 		tshul gyi sgo ni gang du tshul drug gi sa bon brjod pa ste /
de kho na'i don gyi tshul dang 'thob pa'i tshul dang bshad pa'i tshul dang mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i tshul dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul dang dgongs pa'i tshul gyis so /
tshul drug po 'di dag las tshul gong ma gsum ni tshul 'og ma gsum gyis go rims bzhin du rig par bya ste /
tadyathāsvādanasūtre asti bhikṣavaḥ rūpe āsvāda ityevamādināpavādāntaṃ samāropāntaṃ ca varjayitvā tattvārthanayo 'bhidyotitaḥ /
astyāsvāda ādīnavo niḥsaraṇamityanenāpavādānto varjitaḥ rūpe yāvadvijñāna ityanena samāropāntaḥ skandhamātre saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ cānātmanīti pradarśayatā yāvaccāhaṃ bhikṣavaḥ yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho 'smītyadhyajñāsiṣamityanena prāptinayo 'cintyanayena paridīpitaḥ pratyātmavedanīyādhigamasūcanāt /
sarvamevedaṃ sūtraṃ deśanānayaḥ /
sa cābhiprāyeṇānugantavyaḥ 		dper na ro myang ba'i mdo las dge slong dag gzugs la ro myong ba yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' dang sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha' spangs nas de kho na'i don gyi tshul ston to /
ro myang ba dang nyes dmigs dang nges par 'byung ba yod do zhes bya ba 'dis ni skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' spangs so /
gzugs nas rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar 'dis ni sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha' spangs te /
phung po tsam la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am /
rnam par byang bar zad kyi bdag ni med do zhes rab tu bstan to /
dge slong dag ngas ji tsam tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar nang du 'du shes so zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'thob pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bstan te /
so so rang gis rig par bya ba thob par ston pa'i phyir ro /
mdo 'di thams cad ni bshad pa'i tshul gyis so /
de yang dgongs pa'i tshul gyis khong du chud par bya ste /
sa parijñeyaṃ vastu parijñeyamartham parijñām parijñāphalam tatpravedanāṃ cābhipretyedaṃ sūtraṃ bhāṣitamiti yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang yongs su shes pa dang yongs su shes par bya ba'i 'bras bu dang de rab tu shes pa la dgongs nas mdo de dag bshad do /
tatra parijñeyaṃ vastu rūpādikam de la yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po ni gzugs la sogs pa'o /
parijñeyo 'rtha āsvādādikaḥ tena prakāreṇa tasya rūpādikasya vastunaḥ parijñānāt yongs su shes bar bya ba'i don ni ro myang ba la sogs pa ste /
rnam pa des gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po de yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro /
parijñaiṣāṃ pañcānāmupādānaskandhānāmevaṃ triparivartena yathābhūtaparijñānam yongs su shes pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag nga ltar gsum du bsgyur bas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i shes pa'o /
parijñāphalamasmāt sadevakāllokādyāvat sadevamānuṣāyāḥ prajñāyā vimuktiryāvadvipramuktiḥ yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di las zhes bya ba nas /
lha dang mi dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i bar las grol ba nas rnam par rab tu grol zhes bya ba'i bar du'o /
tatpravedanānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho 'smītyadhyajñāsiṣamiti de rab tu shes pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par nang du shes so zhes bya ba'o /
parijñādimukhaṃ yatra tattvalakṣaṇamāramya parijñālakṣaṇena prahāṇalakṣaṇena sākṣātkriyālakṣaṇena eṣāmeva tattvalakṣaṇādīnāṃ prakārabhedalakṣaṇena āśrayāśritasaṃvandhalakṣaṇena parijñādīnāmāntarāyikadharmalakṣaṇena āmulomikadharmalakṣaṇena aparijñādiṣu cādīnavānuśaṃsālakṣaṇena cārtho nirdiśyate yongs su shes pa la sogs pa'i sgo ni gang du de kho na'i mtshan nyid las brtsams nas yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang spong ba'i mtshan nyad dang mngon sum du byed pa'i mtshan nyid dang bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid dang de kho na'i mchan nyid la sogs pa 'di dag gi rnam pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid dang; gnas dang gnas par 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid dang yongs su shes pa la sogs pa'i bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dang yongs su ma shes pa la sogs pa dang yongs su shes pa la sogs pa la nyes dmigs dang phan yon gyi mtshan nyid kyis don ston pa ste /
tadyathātraivāsvādanasūtre dper na ro myang ba'i mdo de nyid las 'byung ba /
tatra tattvalakṣaṇamupādānaskandhasaṃgṛhītaduḥkhasatyam /
parijñālakṣaṇaṃ tasyaivāsvādādinā yathābhūtaṃ parijñānam /
prahāṇalakṣaṇaṃ sākṣātkriyālakṣaṇaṃ ca sarvasmāllokādvimuktiḥ āvaraṇaprahāṇe nāśrayaparivṛttisākṣātkaraṇāt bhāvanālakṣaṇaṃ viparyāsāpagatena cetasā bahulavihāraḥ 		de la de kho na'i mtshan nyid ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lngas bsdus pa sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'o /
yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni ro myang ba la sogs pas de nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so; ;spang ba'i mtshan nyid dang mngon sum du byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'jig rten thams cad las rnam par grol ba ste /
sgrib pa spong ba dang gnas gyur pa mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro /
bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid ni phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis len mang du gnas pa'o /
prakārabhedalakṣaṇam tattvalakṣaṇasya pañcadhā bhedo rūpaṃ yāvadvijñānamiti /
parijñālakṣaṇasya tridhā bheda āsvādaṃ cāsvādayato yāvanniḥsaraṇaṃ ca niḥsarato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti 		rnam par rab tu dbye ba'i mtshan nyid ni de kho na'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga'i dbye ba ste /
gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du'o /
yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par gsum du rab tu dbye ste /
ro myang ba la ro myang ba dang nyes dmigs la nyes dmigs dang nges par 'byung ba'i bar la nges par 'byung bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so /
prahāṇalakṣaṇasya sākṣātkriyālakṣaṇasya dvidhā bhedaḥ kleśavimuktirduḥkhavimuktiśca spong ba'i mtshan nyid dang mngon sum du byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
nyon mongs pa las rnam par grol ba dang sdug bsngal las rnam par grol ba'o /
tatra sadevakāllokādyāvatsadevamānuṣāyāḥ prajāyā vimuktiḥ kleśebhyo vimokṣādata eva tadviśeṣaṇārthamāha niḥsṛta iti /
tadyathā hyanyatra sūtre niḥsaraṇaṃ katamadbhayaḥ 		de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zhes bya ba nas /
lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i bar las grol ba ni nyon mongs pa rnams las rnam par thar pa'i phyir ro /
de bas na de bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba zhes gsungs te /
'di ltar mdo gzhan las nges par 'byung ba gang zhe na /
chandarāgavinayaḥ chandarāgaprahāṇaṃ chandarāgasamatikrama ityuktam gang 'dir 'dun pa dang 'dod chags 'dul ba dang 'dun pa dang 'dod chags spang ba dang 'dun pa dang 'dod chags las yang dag par 'da' ba'o zhes gsungs so /
evamanāgataduḥkhābhinirvartaka kleśavisaṃyoge sati duḥkhādapi vipramukto bhavatīti viśeṣaṇārthamāha visaṃyukto vipramukta iti de ltar ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal mngon bar 'grub par byed pa'i nyon mongs pa dang bral na sdug bsngal las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir bral ba dang rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba gsungs so /
bhāvanālakṣaṇasya dvidhā bhedo darśanamārgo bhāvanāmārgaśca bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa gnyis su rab tu dbye ste /
mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam mo /
tatra viparyāsāpagatena cetaseti darśanamārgaṃ darśayati bahulaṃ vyahārṣamityanena bhāvanāmārgam de la phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis zhes bya ba ni /
mthong ba'i lam ston to /
len mang du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam ston to /
āśrayāśritasaṃbandhalakṣaṇaṃ tatvalakṣaṇādīnāmuttarottarāṇāmāśrayatvasūcanāt gnas dang gnas par 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid ni /
de kho na'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa 'og ma gong ma'i gnas yin par ston pa'i phyir ro /
parijñādīnāmāntarāyikalakṣaṇamevaṃ triparivartena yathābhūtamaparijñānam yongs su shes pa la sogs pa'i bar du gcod pa'i mtshan nyid ni de ltar gsum du bsgyur ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par mi shes pa'o /
anulomikalakṣaṇaṃ yathāvyavasthānameṣāmeva rūpādīnāmāsvādādito vicāraṇā rjes su mthun pa'i mtshan nyid ni gzugs la sogs pa 'di dag ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du nyes dmigs la sogs par rnam par dpyod pa'o /
aparijñānādīnavalakṣaṇamavimuktiryāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherasaṃbodhaḥ yongs su mi shes pa la sogs pa la nyes dmigs kyi mtshan nyid ni mi grol ba nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya pa'i bar du'o /
viparyayādanuśaṃsalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyamiti /
balābalamukhaṃ yatraikena padenānucyamānenāyamartho na gamitaḥ syāditi pratyekaṃ sarveṣāṃ padānāṃ sāmarthya pradarśyate 		de las bzlog pa ni phan yon gyi mchan nyid du rig par bya'o /
stobs dang stobs ma yin pa'i sgo ni gang du tshig gcig ma brjod na don 'di go bar mi 'gyur bas tshig so so thams cad kyis nus pa ston pa ste /
tadyathā pratītyotpādasūtre 'smin satīdaṃ bhavatyasyotpādādidamutpadyate yadutāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā ityevamādi eṣāṃ ca padānāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthya pūrvavadveditavya yathā pratītyasamutpādasya lakṣaṇanirdeśe dper na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mdo las 'di yod pas 'di 'byung /
'di skyes pa'i phyir 'di skye ba ste /
'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o /
tshig 'di dag gi so so'i nus pa ni ji ltar gang du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid du bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o /
pratyāhāramukhaṃ yatra sūtrasyaikaṃ padaṃ gṛhītvā vistareṇārthaḥ pratinirdiśyate /
tadyathā ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhikṣurhimavantamapi parvatarājaṃ mukhavāyunā cālayet kaḥ punarvādaḥ savāsanāyā avidyāyāḥ /
katamaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ /
iha bhikṣavo bhikṣuścittasyotpādakuśalo bhavati iha bhikṣurviviktaṃ kāmairyāvaccaturthadhyānamupasaṃpadya viharati 		bzlas te brjod pa'i sgo ni gang du mdo'i tshig gcig bzung bas rgya cher don yang dag par ston pa ste /
dper na chos drug dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni kha'i dbugs kyis ri'i rgyal po gangs ri yang 'thor na ro lta bu'i ma rig pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /
drug gang zhe na /
'di la dge slong dag 'di la dge slong sems bskyed pa la mkhas pa yin pa nas /
thabs la mkhas pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa lta bu'o /
mdo 'di las ji ltar na dge slong sems bskyed pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na /
'di la dge slong ni 'dod pa dag las dben pa nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du rdzogs par byas nas gnas te /
evaṃ hi bhikṣuścittasyotpādakuśalo bhavati de ltar na dge slong sems bskyed pa la mkhas pa yin no /
kathaṃ ca bhikṣuścittasya sthitikuśalo bhavati ji ltar na dge slong sems gnas pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na /
iha bhikṣurāsevanānvayādyaddhānabhāgīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tat sthitibhāgīyaṃ karoti 'di la dge slong ni kun du bsten pa'i rgyu'i bar gyis gang nyams pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i bsam gtan de gnas pa'i cha dang mthun par byed de /
evaṃ bhikṣuḥ sthitikuśalo bhavati de ltar na dge slong de sems gnas pa la mkhas pa yin no /
kathaṃ ca bhikṣurvyutthānakuśalo bhavati ji ltar na dge slong de sems ldang bar byed pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na /
iha bhikṣurāsevanānvayādyatsthitibhāgīyaṃ dhyānaṃ tadviśeṣabhāgīyaṃ karoti 'di la dge slong ni kun du bsten pa'i rgyus gnas pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i bsam gtan de khyad par du gyur pa'i cha dang mthun par byed de /
evaṃ hi bhikṣurvyutthānakuśalo bhavati de ltar na dge slong ldang bar byed pa la mkhas pa yin no /
kathaṃ ca bhikṣurāyakuśalo bhavati ji ltar na dge slong 'phel bar byed pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na /
iha bhikṣuranutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmiti vistareṇa dve samyakprahāṇe 'di la dge slong ni dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams zhes bya ba yang dag par spang ba nyid rgya cher bya ste /
evaṃ hi bhikṣurāyakuśalo bhavati de ltar na dge slong 'phel ba la mkhas pa yin no /
kathaṃ ca bhikṣurapāyakuśalo bhavati ji ltar na de slong 'bri ba la mkhas pa yin zhe na /
iha hi bhikṣurutpannānāṃ pāpakā nāmakuśalānāmiti vistareṇa dve samyakprahāṇe sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams zhes bya ba yang dag par spong ba gnyis kyis rgya cher bya ste /
evaṃ hi bhikṣurapāyakuśalo bhavati de ltar na dge slong 'bri ba la mkhas pa yin no /
kathaṃ hi bhikṣurupāyakuśalo bhavati ji ltar na dge slong thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na /
iha hi bhikṣuśchandasamādhipradhānasaṃskārasamanvāgatamṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayatīti vistareṇa catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ 'di la dge slong ni 'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rgya cher sbyar te /
evaṃ hi bhikṣurupāyakuśalo bhavatīti de ltar na dge slong thabs la mkhas pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo /
abhinirhāramukhaṃ yatra pratipadaṃ catuṣkādibhirnirdiśyate mngon par sgrub pa'i sgo ni gang du tshig re re la yang mu bzhi la sogs pa ston pa ste /
teṣvapi catuṣkādiṣvekaikaṃ padamaparaiścatuṣkādibhiraparyanto hi nirhāro veditavyaḥ mu bzhi pa la sogs pa la de dag gi tshig re re la yang gzhan bzhi la sogs pas thug pa med par mngon bar bsgrub par rig par bya'o /
dper na sangs rgyas rtsom pa'i mdo las /
tadyathā buddhākṣepasūtre catvāra ime bodhisattvānāṃ bodhipariśodhakā dharmāḥ śūnyatābhāvanā sarvasattveṣvapratihatacittatā bodhisattvānāṃ nityaṃ hitopasaṃharaṇatā nirāmiṣeṇa cittena dharmadānasaṃprakāśanatā ceti bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i chos rnams te /
stong pa nyid sgom pa dang sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rtag tu phan pa nye bar sgrub pa'i sems dang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa yang dag par rab tu ston pa'o zhes bya ba bzhi ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don las brtsams te /
catuṣkaḥ svārtha paramārtha cārabhya bodhipariśodhanāya caturvipakṣapratipakṣeṇa veditavyaḥ /
catvāro vipakṣāḥ samāpattyāsvādanā vyāpādaḥ mānaḥ tṛṣṇā ca lābhasatkāre /
aparaḥ paryāyaḥ prathamena dharmeṇa kleśaprahāṇapratipakṣaḥ 		byang chub yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs bzhi'i gnyen por rig par bya'o /
mi mthun pa'i phyogs bzhi ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba dang gnod sems dang nga rgyal dang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sred pa'o /
rnams grangs gzhan du na chos dang pos ni nyon mongs pa spong ba'i gnyen po bstan to /
śeṣairhīnayānaparivarjanā paridīpitāstribhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ bodhicittena sarvasattvopādānataḥ avatīrṇaparipācanataḥ anavatīrṇāvatāraṇataśca lhag ma rnams kyis ni rgyu gsum gyis theg pa dman pa yongs su spang bar bsten te /
byang chub kyi sems kyis sems can thams cad nye bar 'dzin pa dang zhugs pa yongs su smin par byed pa dang ma zhugs pa 'jug par byed pas so /
aparaḥ paryāyaḥ prathamena jñānasaṃbhārastribhiḥ puṇyasaṃbhāraḥ paridīpitaḥ upādānaparipācanāvatāraṇaiḥ pratyekaṃ puṇyaviśeṣaprasavanataḥ rnam grangs gzhan du na dang pos ni ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su bstan to /
gsum gyis ni bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su bstan te /
nye bar 'dzin pa dang yongs su smin par byed pa dang 'jug pa rnam pa re res kyang bsod nams kyi khyad par skyed pa'i phyir ro /
punardvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmāśayataśca maitracittatayā pratipattitaścādhigamāgamopadeśābhyām yang rgyu gnyis kyis rig par bya ste /
bsam pas ni byams pa'i sems su'o /
bsgrub bas ni thob pa dang lung nye bar ston par rig par bya'o /
caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ śūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti adhyātmaṃ cittāvikaṃpanatayādhimuktipravicayabalādhānatayā sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathātmyaprativedhataḥ sarvāvaraṇavimokṣataśca chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid bsgom ste /
nang du sems su rnam par mi rtog pa dang mos pa la rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i stobs skyed pa dang chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs par byed pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par thar pa ste /
yadāśritya yathā ca bhāvayanti tadetena paridīpitam 'di dag gis ni gang la brten nas ji ltar bsgom pa de yongs su bsten to /
kimāśritya /
dhyānapāramitām 		gang la brten nas she na /
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'o /
kathaṃ bhāvayanti ji ltar bsgom zhe na /
pṛthagjanamārgeṇa śrutacintābalādhānataḥ śaikṣamārgeṇāśaikṣamārgeṇa ca so so'i skye bo'i lam gyis thos pa dang bsam pa'i stobs skyed pa dang slob pa'i lam dang mi slob pa'i lam gyis so /
caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ sarvasattveṣvapratihatacittā bhavanti maitrībhāvanayā pratipatyavikopanatayā nimittāvikalpanatayā khedasahiṣṇutayā ca /
atrāpi yadāśritya yathā cāpratihatacittā bhavanti tatparidīpitaṃ bhavati 		byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na /
sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin te /
byams pa bsgom pa dang sgrub pa rnam par mi 'khrugs pa dang mtshan ma la rnam par mi rtog pa dang skyo ba bzod pa'o /
'dir yang gang la brten nas ji ltar zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin pa de yongs su bstan to /
kimāśritya gang la brten nas she na /
paurvajanmikīṃ maitrībhāvanām tshe rabs snga ma'i byams pa bsgoms pa las so /
kathamapratihatacittā bhavanti ji ltar zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin zhe na /
mithyāpratipattisthiteṣu svacitāvikopanataḥ apakāriṣvapakāranimittāvikalpanataḥ parahitārthaṃ vyāyāmāparikhedataśca log par sgrub pa la gnas pa rnams la sems rnam par mi 'khrugs pa dang gnod par byed pa rnams la gnod par byed pa'i mtshan mar rnam par mi rtog pa dang gzhan la phan pa'i don du rtsol ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'o /
caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā bodhisattvānāṃ nityaṃ hitamupasaṃharanti ātmanaḥ paritulanatayā samyagavavādapravartanatayā saurabhyasukhasaṃvāsanatayā pūjālābhasatkāraparicaryopasaṃharaṇatayā ca /
atrāpi yadāśritya yathā copasaṃharati tatparidīpitam 		byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams la rtag tu phan pa nye bar bsgrub pa yin te /
bdag yongs su 'jal ba dang yang dag pa'i gdams pa la 'jug pa dang des shing 'grogs na bde ba dang mchod pa dang rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang bsnyen bkur bya ba nye bar sgrub pa'o /
'dir yang gang la brten nas ji ltar nye bar ba sgrub pa de yongs su bsten to /
kimāśritya /
nihatamānatām /
kathamupasaṃharati 		gang la brten nas she na /
nga rgyal bcag pa la'o /
ji ltar nye bar bsgrub ce na /
yathoktaṃ tribhiḥ prakārairhīnasamaśiṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yathākramam ji skad bstan pa rnam pa gsum gyis dma' ba dang mtshungs pa dang khyad par du 'phags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la go rims bzhin no /
caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā nirāmiṣeṇa cittena dharmadānaṃ saṃprakāśayanti antarāyasukhaprativedhatayā mohalayāpanayanakauśalyatayā nāthakaradharmārāmatayā ca byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa yang dag par rab tu ston te /
bar du gcod pa legs par rab tu rtogs pa dang rmongs pa dang bying ba sel ba la rab tu mkhas pa dang yid bde ba nye bar sgrub pa dang mgon byed pa'i chos las dga' ba'o /
atrāpi yadāśritya /
yathā ca saṃprakāśayanti tatparidīpitam 		'dir yang gang la brten nas ji ltar yang dag par rab tu ston pa de yongs su bstan to /
kimāśritya gang la brten nas she na /
lābhasatkārasyāntarāyakaratvaprativeghatām /
kathaṃ saṃprakāśayanti 		rnyed pa dang bkur sti bar du gcod par byed pa nyid du legs par rtogs pa la'o /
ji ltar yang dag par rab tu ston ce na /
saṃdarśanato mūḍhānām samādāpanataḥ samuttejanataśca pramādasaṅgānātmaparibhavena vā līnānām saṃpraharṣaṇataḥ samyakpratipannānām prakṛtyaiva ca dharmārāmatayā rmongs pa rnams la yang dag par ston pa dang bag med pa la chags pa dang bdag dman par 'dzin pas zhum pa rnams la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang yang dag bar zhugs pa rnams la yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed ba dang rang bzhin gyis chos la dga' bas so /
prathamasyānyacatuṣkaḥ padaprabhedādibhirnirhāro veditavyaḥ de ltar bzhi pa gzhan ni bzhi pa dang po'i tshig rab tu dbye ba mngon par sgrub par rig par bya'o /
prabhidyasaṃdarśanaviniścayo yathānirdiṣṭeṣu skandhādiṣu dharmeṣu yathāyogamekāvacārakādīni rab tu phye nas kun tu bstan pa rnam par nges pa ni ji skad du bstan pa'i phung po la sogs pa'i chos rnams la gcig nas rtogs pa la sogs par ci rigs par sbyar ro /
tatra /
ekāvacārako nāma praśno yenaikaṃ dharmaṃ pariśiṣṭaiḥ saha pratyekaṃ praśnayitvā tamapahāya dvitīyaṃ tenānyaiśca saha praśnayatyevamekaikasyaiva sarvān praśnayati 		de la gcig nas rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dri ba ni gang gis chos gcig chos lhag ma gzhan rnams dang lhan cig tu re re nas dris nas de bor te /
des gnyis ba yang gzhan rnams dang lhan cig tu 'dri ba'o /
de bzhin du re re nas thams cad 'dri ba ste /
tadyathā yaścakṣurāyatanena samanvāgato rūpāyatanenāpi saḥ yo vā rūpāyatanena cakṣurāyatanenāpi sa iti pūrvapādakaḥ dper na gang mig gi skye mched dang ldan pa de gzugs kyi skye mched dang yang ldan nam /
gang gzugs kyi skye mched dang ldan pa de mig gi skye mched dang yang ldan nam zhes bya ba ni tshig gong ma dang sbyar ba'o /
yaścakṣurāyatanena samanvāgataḥ śrotrāyatanenāpi sa ityatra catuṣkoṭikam gang mig gi skye mched dang ldan pa de rnam ba'i skye mched dang yang ldan nam zhes bya ba 'di la mu bzhi'o /
evaṃ yāvanmanaāyatanenāpi sa ityatra yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam /
dharmāyatanenāpi sa ityatra pūrvapādakaḥ 		de bzhin du de yid kyi skye mched dang yang ldan nam zhes bya ba'i bar du 'di la mu ci rigs su sbyar bar bya'o /
de la chos kyi skye mched dang yang ldan nam zhes bya ba 'di ni tshig gong ma dang sbyar bar bya'o /
yo rūpāyatanena samanvāgataścakṣurāyatanenāpi saḥ yo vā cakṣurāyatanena rūpāyatanenāpi sa iti paścātpādakaḥ gzugs kyi skye mched dang ldan pa gang yin pa de mig gi skye mched dang yang ldan nam /
gang mig gi skye mched dang ldan pa de gzugs kyi skye mched dang yang ldan nam zhes bya ba 'di ni tshig 'og ma dang yang sbyar ba'o /
yo rūpāyatanena samanvāgataḥ śrotrāyatanenāpi sa ityatra cāpi paścātpādakaḥ /
evaṃ yāvaddharmāyatanena yathāyogaṃ yojayitavyam 		gang gzugs kyi skye mched dang ldan pa de rna ba'i skye mched dang yang ldan nam zhes bya ba 'di yang tshig 'og ma dang sbyar bar bya'o /
de bzhin du chos kyi skye mched dang yang ldan nam zhes ci rigs su sbyar bar bya'o /
yaḥ śrotrāyatanena samanvāgataścakṣurāyatanenāpi sa ityatra catuṣkoṭikam gang rna ba'i skye mched dang ldan pa de ni mig gi skye mched dang yang ldan nam zhes bya ba 'di la mu bzhi'o /
evaṃ yāvaddharmāyatanenāpi yojyam de bzhin du chos kyi skye mched kyi bar du yang sbyar bar bya'o /
evamekaṃkāmarṣeṇānukramaśaḥ sarvāṇyāyatanāni parasparaṃ yojayitavyāni de ltar re re nas gsal ba'i tshul gyis skye mched thams cad phan tshun du sbyar bar bya'o /
pūrvapādakaṃ dvayordharmayoḥ kathaṃcideva dharmamārabhya parasparaṃ pṛṣṭayoḥ pūrvadharmamadhiṣṭhāya yadvayākriyate /
tadyathā yajjñānaṃ jñeyamapi tadyadvā jñeyaṃ jñānamapi taditi /
pūrvapādakam yattāvajjñānaṃ jñeyamapi taditi /
syājjñeyaṃ na jñānam tadanye dharmā iti 		tshig gong ma dang sbyor ba gnyis gnyis po ni chos 'ga' zhig la brtsams nas phan tshun dris na chos gong ma la brten nas gang lung ston pa ste /
dper na shes pa gang yin pa de shes bya yang de'am /
shes bya gang yin pa shes pa yang de 'am zhes bya ba'i ni tshig gong ma dang sbyor ba ste /
shes pa gang yin pa de shes bya yang de yin no /
shes bya yin la shes pa ma yin pa'ang yod de /
de las gzhan pa'i chos rnams so /
paścātpādakaṃ tathaiva dvayordharmayoḥ parasparaṃ pṛṣṭayoryatpaścimamadhiṣṭhāya vyākriyate tshig 'og ma dang sbyor ba ni /
de bzhin du gnyis gnyis dris pa la gang phyi ma la brten nas lung ston pa ste /
tadyathā yadgrāhyaṃ grāhakamapi tadyadvā grāhakaṃ grāhyamapi taditi /
paścātpādakam yattāvadgrāhakaṃ grāhyamapi tat 		dper na gzung ba gang yin pa de 'dzin pa'ang de 'am /
'dzin pa gang yin pa de gzung ba'ang de'am zhes bya ba ni tshig 'og ma dang sbyor ba ste /
'dzin pa gang yin pa gzung ba yang de'o /
syādgrāhyaṃ na grāhakam rūpādayaḥ pañca viṣayā dharmāyatanaṃ ca saṃprayuktakavarjyam /
dvikoṭikaṃ yatra dve koṭī vyākriyete tadanyāsaṃbhavāt tadyathā skandhasya vyavasthānaṃ dhātuvyavasthānaṃ ca nigamayyocyate yā skandhasaṃkhyā dhātusaṃkhyāpi sā yā vā dhātusaṃkhyā skandhasaṃkhyāpi seti /
dvikoṭikam syāt skandhasaṃkhyā na dhātusaṃkhyā rūpaskandho vijñānaskandhaścaḥ 		gzung ba yin la 'dzin pa ma yin pa'ang yod de /
gzugs la sogs pa yul lnga po dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma gtogs pa'i chos kyi skye mched do /
mu gnyis pa ni gang du mu gnyis ston pa ste /
de las gzhan med pa'i phyir ro /
dper na phung po rnam par gzhag pa dang khams rnam par gzhag pa la brten nas brjod pa ste /
phung po'i grangs gang yin pa khams kyi grangs kyang de'am /
khams kyi grangs gang yin pa phung po'i grangs kyang de'am zhes bya ba ni mu gnyis pa ste /
phung po'i grangs yin la khams kyi grangs ma yin pa'ang yod de gzugs kyi phung po dang rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o /
tathāhi naiko dhāturasti yaḥ sakalarūpaskandhalakṣaṇo vā syāt sakalavijñānaskandhalakṣaṇo vā 'di ltar gzugs kyi phung po'i mtshan nyid mtha' dag gam rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i mtshan nyid mtha' dag khams gcig tu gyur pa med do /
dhātusaṃkhyā na skandhasaṃkhyāḥ dharmadhāturiti /
trikoṭikaṃ yatra tisra eva koṭayo vyākriyante 		khams kyi grang yin la phung po'i grangs ma yin pa'ang yod de /
chos kyi khams so /
mu gsum pa ni gang du mu gsum pa kho na ston pa ste /
tadyathā yā skandhasaṃkhyāyatanasaṃkhyāpi sā yā vāyatanasaṃkhyā skandhasaṃkhyāpi seti dper na phung po'i grangs gang yin pa skye mched kyi grangs kyang de 'am /
skye mched kyi grangs gang yin pa phung po'i grangs kyang de'am zhes bya ba ni mu gsum pa ste /
trikoṭikam syāt skandhasaṃkhyā nāyatanasaṃkhyā rūpaskandhaḥ phung po'i grangs yin la skye mched kyi grangs ma yin pa'ang yod de /
gzugs kyi phung po'o /
syādāyatanasaṃkhyā na skandhasaṃkhyā dharmāyatanam skye mched ni grangs yin la phung po'i grangs ma yin pa 'ang yod de /
chos kyi skye mched do /
syāt skandhasaṃkhyāyatanasaṃkhyā ca vijñānaskandho manaāyatanaṃ ca phung po'i grangs kyang yin la skye mched kyi grangs kyang yin pa'ang yod de /
rnam par shes pa'i phung po dang yid kyi skye mched do /
anubhayasaṃkhyāyāḥ skandhāyataneṣvasaṃbhava eveti /
catuṣkoṭikaṃ yatra catasro 'pi koṭayo vyākriyante 		gnyi ga ma yin pa'i grangs ni phung po dang skye mched la med do /
mu bzhi pa ni gang du mu bzhi ston pa ste /
tadyathā yaścakṣurindriyeṇa samanvāgataḥ śrotrendriyeṇāpi saḥ yo vā śrotrendriyeṇa samanvāgataścakṣurindriyeṇāpi sa iti /
catuṣkoṭikam prathamā koṭirutpannāvihīnacakṣurbadhiraḥ 		dper na mig gi dbang po dang ldan pa gang yin pa rna ba'i dbang po dang ldan pa'ang de'am /
rna ba'i dbang po dang ldan pa gang yin pa mig gi dbang po dang ldan pa'ang de'am zhes bya ba ni mu bzhi pa ste /
mu dang po ni mig skyes shing ma nyams la 'on pa'o /
dvitīyotpannāvihīnaśrotro 'ndhaḥ mu gnyis pa ni rna ba skyes shing ma nyams la long ba'o /
tṛtīyotpannāvihīnacakṣuḥśrotraḥ mu gsum pa ni mig dang rna ba skyes la ma nyams pa'o /
caturthī tānākārān sthāpayitvā mu bzhi pa ni rnam pa de dag ma gtogs pa'o /
oṃkāritaṃ yatra praśne vyākaraṇamomiti kriyate evametadityabhyupagamyata ityarthaḥ de de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni gang dris pa lung du bstan pa la de bzhin no zhes brjod pa ste /
de de bzhin no zhes khas len ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /
tadyathā ye 'nityāḥ sarve te saṃskārāḥ ye vā saṃskārāḥ sarve te 'nityā iti pṛṣṭena omiti vyākartavyam /
prātikṣepikaṃ yatra neti pratikṣipyate 		dper na gang mi rtag pa de dag thams cad 'dus byas yin nam /
'dus byas gang yin pa de dag thams cad mi rtag pa'am zhes dris pa la de bzhin no zhes bstan par bya'o /
spang ba ni gang du ma yin no zhes spong ba ste /
tadyathā skandhavinirmuktāḥ saṃskārāḥ katibhiḥ satyaiḥ saṃgṛhītā iti /
prātikṣepikam na santi skandhavinirmuktāḥ saṃskārā iti /
saṃpraśnaviniścayaḥ aṣṭākāraḥ kāpadeśastadyathā ko nopalabhate /
prajñāpāramitālābhī bodhisattvaḥ /
kiṃ nopalabhate 		dper na phung po lnga las ma gtogs pa'i 'du byed rnams bden pa gang dag gis bsdus zhes zer ba la phung po lnga las ma gtogs pa'i 'du byed dag med do zhes spong ba'o /
yang dag par dri ba rnam par nges pa ni rnam pa brgyad de /
ci zhes bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /
su zhig mi dmigs she na /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o /
grāhyalakṣaṇaṃ grāhakalakṣaṇaṃ ca ci mi dmigs she na gzung ba'i mtshan nyid dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid do /
kena nopalabhate /
prajñāpāramitayā /
kasmai nopalabhate 		gang gis mi dmigs she na /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas so /
ci'i phyir mi dmigs she na /
sarvasattvaparitrāṇārthamanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye /
kuto nopalabhate /
buddhotpādārāgaṇataḥ saddharmaśravaṇato yoniśomanaskārato dharmānudharmapratipattitaśca /
kasya nopalabhate /
sarvadharmāṇām /
kutra nopalabhate /
adhimukticaryābhūmau yāvaddaśamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau /
kativighaścānupalambhaḥ 		sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par bya ba'i phyir ro /
gang las mi dmigs she na /
sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa las so /
gang dag gi mi dmigs she na /
chos thams cad kyi'o /
gang du mi dmigs she na mos pas spyod pa'i sa nas sa bcu pa'i bar du'o /
rnam pa du zhig mi dmigs she na /
ekādaśavidhaḥ utpannaviruddhaḥ anutpannaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ hetuvalotpannaḥ mitrabalotpannaḥ sarvadharmānupalambhaḥ śūnyatānupalambhaḥ sāsmimānaḥ nirasmimānaḥ asaṃbhṛtasaṃbhārasya saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārasya ca rnam pa bcu gcig ste /
skyes nas 'gags pa dang ma skyes pa dang mngon du gyur pa dang rgyu'i stobs las byung ba dang mdza' bo'i stobs las byung ba dang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa dang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang bcas pa dang nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal med pa dang tshogs ma bsags pa dang tshogs bsags pa ste /
mi dmigs pa 'di dag ni gang ci yang rung ste /
ete cānupalambhā yat kiṃcidatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ yāvadyadvā dūre yadvāntika ityetadanukramānusāreṇa draṣṭavyāḥ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang nang dang phyi dang rags pa dang phra ba dang ngan pa dang bzang po dang rgyang ring ba dang thag nye ba zhes bya ba 'di dag gi go rims kyi tshul gyis blta bar bya'o /
yathā kāpadeśa evaṃ yāpadeśaḥ /
yo nopalabhate yadyena yasmai yato yasya yatra nopalabhate yāvadvividhaścānupalambha iti 		ci zhes bstan pa la ji lta bar gang zhes bstan pa la yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba 'di la gang zhig mi dmigs pa dang gang dang gang gis dang gang gi phyir dang gang las dang gang gi dang gang du mi dmigs pa dang ji snyed cig mi dmigs pa'o /
api khalu catvāro viniścayamārgā dūṣakādayaḥ yang rnam par nges pa'i lam bzhi ste /
sun 'byin par byed pa la sogs pa'o /
tatra dūṣakaḥ durākhyātasya parapakṣasyāsādhurayamiti pratiṣedhakaḥ de la sun 'byin par byed pa ni gzhan gyi phyogs nyes par smras pa la /
'di legs pa ma yin no zhes sel par byed pa'o /
sādhakaḥ svākhyātasya svapakṣasya sādhurayamiti pratiṣṭhāpakaḥ sgrub par byed pa ni rang gi phyogs legs par smras pa la 'di ni legs pa'o zhes 'jog par byed pa'o /
chedakaḥ pareṣāmutpannotpanneṣu saṃśayeṣu niścayadāyakaḥ /
bodhakasteṣvartheṣu samūḍhānāṃ tadarthavyutpādakaḥ 		gcod par byed pa ni gzhan dag gi the tshom skyed pa'am /
ma skyes pa la rnam par nges par sbyin par byed pa'o /
khong du chud par byed pa ni don de dang de dag la rmongs pa rnams la don de ston par byed pa'o /
kṛtyānuṣṭhānaviniścayo laukikānāmanyonyaṃ jīvikopāyādisamarthanaprayojanam bya ba sgrub pa rnam par nges pa ni 'jig rten phan tshun du 'tsho ba'i thabs la sogs pa'i dgos pa sgrub pa'o /
avatāraviniścayastrayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ katamasminyāne 'vatareyamavatārayeyaṃ ceti vicāraṇā 'jug pa rnam par nges pa ni theg pa gsum po dag las theg pa gang la 'jug par bya zhing zhugs par bya zhes rnam par spyod pa'o /
adhimuktiviniścayaḥ śrutamayyā prajñayā yathādeśanaṃ saṃpratyayaḥ mos par rnam par rnam par nges pa ni thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis ji ltar thos pa bzhin du yid ches pa'o /
yuktiviniścayaḥ cintāmayyā prajñayā paurvāparyeṇābhiprāyaparitulanam rigs pas rnam par nges pa ni bsam pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis snga phyi'i dgongs pa yongs su 'jal ba'o /
sāṃkathyaviniścayo yathāśrutacintitānāṃ praśnapratipraśnakriyāyogenānyonyaṃ dharmasaṃbhogaḥ 'bel pa'i gtam gyis rnam par nges pa ni ji ltar thos pa dang bsam pa rnams dri ba dang phyir zhing dri bar bya ba'i tshul gyis phan tshun chos la rdzogs par longs spyod pa'o /
prativedhaviniścayo darśanamārgastena satyaprativedhāt rab tu rtogs pas rnam par nges pa ni mthong ba'i lam ste /
des bden pa rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir ro /
viśuddhiviniścayo bhāvanāmārgastenāvaśeṣa kleśa viśoghanāt rnam par dag pas rnam par nges pa ni bsgom pa'i lam ste /
nges nyon mong pa ma lus par rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro /
abhinirhāraviniścayo viśeṣamārgastena vaiśeṣikaguṇābhinirhārāt mngon par bsgrub pas rnam par nges pa ni khyad par can gyi lam ste /
des yon tan khyad par can mngon par sgrub pa'i phyir ro /
padaprabhedaviniścayo dvikatrikacatuṣkādiprakārābhinirhāramukhenāparyantā dharmadeśanā tshig rab tu dbye ba rnam par nges pa ni gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang bzhi ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa'i sgo nas chos ston pa la mtha' yas so /
anābhogābhogamātrasarvārthasiddhiviniścayastathāgataṃ jñānam vinā pūrvābhogena sarveṣvartheṣvābhogasahakālamasaṃgāpratihatajñānadarśanapravṛtteḥ lhun gyis grub pa dang rtsol ba tsam gyi don thams cad 'grub pa rnam par nges pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes te /
sngon gyi rtsol ba med par yang don thams cad la rtsol ba'i mdo las chags pa med pa dang thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mthong ba 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
vādaviniścayo vādavādādhikaraṇādiṣu kauśalyam /
tatra sarvaṃ vacanaṃ vādaḥ /
prakāraśo loke vādaḥ pravādaḥ /
viruddhayorvādo vivādaḥ 		smra ba rnam par nges pa ni smra ba dang smra ba'i zhal ce ba la sogs pa la mkhas pa ste /
de la smra ba ni tshig thams cad do /
rmad khyer bar smra ba ni 'jig rten na rnam par smra ba'o /
rtsod par smra ba ni mi mthun par smra ba'o /
apavādo garhito vādaḥ /
anukūlo vādo 'nuvādaḥ sāṃkathyaviniścayaḥ /
avagamāya vādo 'vavādaḥ /
vādādhikaraṇam atra vādaḥ kriyata iti kṛtvā 		tshig ngan par smra ba ni smad par smra ba'o /
mthun par smra ba ni rjes su mthun par smra ba'o /
gdams par smra ba ni khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smra ba'o /
smra ba'i zhal ce ba ni gang du smra bar bya ba ste /
'di lta ste /
rgyal po'i pho brang ni gang na rgyal po nyid bzhugs pa'o /
rājakulaṃ yatra rājā svayaṃ saṃnihitaḥ yuktakulaṃ yatra rājñādhiyuktāḥ sabhā vaṇik sabhādi bskos pa 'du ba'i sa ni gang du rgyal pos bskos pa rnams 'du ba'o /
'dus pa ni tshong ba la 'dus pa la sogs pa'o /
prāmāṇikāḥ sahāyakāḥ yeṣāṃ vacanaṃ vādiprativādinau na saṃśayataḥ tshad mar rung ba'i zla grogs ni gang dag gi tshig smra ba dang phyir rgol ba gnyi gas mi gcod pa'o /
dharmārthakuśalāśca śramaṇabrāhmaṇā ye teṣu śāstreṣu granthataścārthataśca vyutpannabuddhayaḥ /
vādādhiṣṭhānaṃ yadadhiṣṭhāya vādaḥ kriyate tadyathā sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca 		dge sbyong dang bram ze chos dang don la mkhas pa rnams ni gang dag bstan bcos de dang de dag gi tshig dang don la blo byang ba'o /
smra ba'i gzhi ni gang la brten nas smra bar bya ba ste /
'di lta ste sgrub pa dang grub pa'o /
de la ngo bo nyid sgrub pa ni bdag gi ngo bo nyid dang chos kyi ngo bo nyid de yod de zhe'am /
tatra svabhāvaḥ sādhya ātmasvabhāvo dharmasvabhāvaśca nāstīti vāstīti vā /
viśeṣaḥ sādhya ātmaviśeṣo dharmaviśeṣaśca sarvagato na sarvagato nityānityo rūpyarūpītyevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ 		med do zhes bya ba'o /
khyad par sgrub pa ni bdag gi khyad par dang chos kyi khyad par te /
thams cad du song ba'am /
thams cad du song ba ma yin pa'am /
rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'i gzugs can nam gzugs can ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa su'o /
pratijñā sādhyasya svarucitārthasya parasaṃprāpaṇavijñāpanā /
sādhyagrahaṇaṃ yadi na kriyeta siddhasyāpi svapakṣasya pareṣāṃ deśanā pratijñā prasajyeta /
svarucitārthagrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta parapakṣasyāpi sādhyasya vacanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
paragrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta ekākino 'pi tadvacanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
saṃprāpaṇagrahaṇaṃ na kriyeta kāyenāpi tadarthābhinayanaṃ pratijñā prasajyeta /
vijñāpanāgrahaṇaṃ na kriyetāvijñāte 'pi tadarthe śrotṛbhiḥ pratijñā prasajyeta 		dam bca' ba ni bdag 'dod pa sgrub pa'i don gzhan la go bar ston pa zhes bya ba la /
gal te sgrub pa ma smos na bdag gi phyogs grub zin pa yang gzhan dag la bstan par dam bca' bar 'gyur ro /
bdag 'dod pa'i don ma smos na ni gzhan gyi phyogs bsgrub pa'i tshig kyang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro /
gzhan ma smos na ni gcig pu yang tshig de dam bca' bar 'gyur ro /
gal te go bar ma smos na ni lus kyi don de brda spyod pa yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro /
gal te ston pa ma smos na ni nyan pa rnams kyis don de ma shes na yang dam bca' bar 'gyur ro /
yathokte tu vyavasthāne sarva ete doṣā na bhavanti tasmādevamasyā vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du rnam par gzhag pa la nyes pa 'di dag thams cad med par 'gyur te /
de lta bas na 'di rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o /
hetustasminneva sādhye 'pratītasyārthasya saṃpratyayanimittaṃ pratyakṣopalaṃbhānupalaṃbhasamākhyānama gtan tshigs ni sgrub pa nyid la ma grags pa'i don yid ches par byed pa'i rgyu mngon sum du dmigs pa dang mi dmigs par bsnyad pa'o zhes bya ba la /
saṃpratyayanimittārtha iha hetvartha iti darśayati yid ches par byed pa'i rgyu'i don 'dir gtan tshigs kyi don zhes bya bar ston te /
tathāhi pratyakṣānupalaṃbhādupalaṃbhādvetyanena samākhyānena tasmin sādhye 'pratītasyārthasya saṃpratyaya utpadyate /
tena tatsamākhyātaṃ tannimittatvāddheturityucyate 		'di ltar mngon sum du dmigs pa dang ma dmigs pa zhes bstan pa 'dis sgrub pa de nyid la ma grags pa'i don la yid ches pa skye ba ste /
des na de bsnyad pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir gtan tshigs zhes bya'o /
pratyakṣopalaṃbhānupalaṃbhau punaḥ svabhāvaṃ liṅgaṃ cādhikṛtya veditavyau mngon sum du dmigs pa dang ma dmigs pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang rtags kyi dbang du byas par rig par bya'o /
dṛṣṭānto dṛṣṭenāntenādṛṣṭasyāntasya samīkaraṇasamākhyānam pratītena bhāgenāpratītasya bhāgasya pratyāyanāya samākhyānamityarthaḥ dpe ni mtha' mthong ba dang mtha' ma mthong ba mtshungs par sbyar zhing bsnyad pa'o zhes bya ba ni grags pa'i cha dang ma grags pa'i cha rtogs par bya ba'i phyir /
bsnyad ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /
upanayaḥ śiṣṭatajjātīyataddharmopagamāya nayatvasamākhyānam /
yathā sādhyo 'rthastribhiravayavaiḥ sādhitastathā śiṣṭānāmapi tajjātīyānāṃ sādhyānāṃ sādhitārthadharmopagamāya nayatvena samākhyānaṃ yuktyātideśa upanayaḥ 		nye bar sbyor ba ni de'i rigs kyi chos lhag ma de dang 'dra ba la de'i chos sbyar ba'i phyir tshul gyis mthun par bsnyad pa'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar bsgrub pa'i don yan lag gsum gyis bsgrubs pa de bzhin du /
lhag ma de dang 'dra ba sgrub pa grub pa rnams la yang sgrub pa'i don gyis chos sbyar ba'i phyir ro /
tshul gyis mthun par bsnyad cing rigs pa 'dra bar ston pa ni nye bar sbyar bar bya'o /
nigamanaṃ niṣṭhāgamanasamākhyānam /
yasmādevaṃ yuktyā sūpapannaṃ tasmāditthamevedamityetannigamanaṃ veditavyam 		mjug sdud pas ni mthar phyin par bsnyad pa'o zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir de ltar rigs pas legs par 'thad pa de'i phyir de ni de bzhin no zhes bya ba de ni mjug sdud du rig par bya'o /
eṣāṃ pratijñādīnāmidamudāharaṇamātraṃ pradarśyate dam bca' ba la sogs pa 'di dag gi dper brjod pa tsam 'di rab tu bstan par bya ste /
tadyathā /
nairātmyavādinastadrūpe 'dhikaraṇe saprativādike nāstyātmeti vacanaṃ pratijñā 		dper na rtsod pa'i phyir rgol ba dang bcas pa de la bdag med par smra bas bdag med do zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di dam bca' ba'o /
skandhavijñaptau caturvidhadoṣopalaṃbhāditi hetuḥ /
sa hyātmā prajñapyamānaḥ skandhalakṣaṇo vā prajñapyeta skandheṣu vā anyatra vā skandhebhyaḥ askandhako vā 		phung po la bdag tu 'dogs pa la nyes pa rnam pa bzhi dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gtan tshig te /
bdag de la 'dogs na phung po'i mtshan nyid du'am /
phung po rnams la'am /
phung po rnams las gzhan pa'am /
phung po med pa zhig tu gdags grang na /
tadyadi skandhalakṣaṇastenāsvatantrāḥ skandhāḥ pratītyasamutpannā udagavyayadharmāṇastallakṣaṇa ātmānopapadyata iti doṣaḥ de gal te phung po'i mtshan nyid ces byar ni phung po de dag rang dbang med par rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang 'jig pa'i chos can te /
bdag de'i mtshan nyid du mi 'thad pas nyes par 'gyur ro /
atha skandheṣu tenānityaskandhāśrita ātmānityaḥ prāpnotīti doṣaḥ ji ste phung po rnams la 'dogs na ni nges na phung po mi rtag pa la brten pas bdag mi rtag par 'gyur pa'i phyir nyes par 'gyur ro /
athānyatra skandhebhyastena nirdehaka ātmā niṣprayojana iti doṣaḥ ji ste phung po dag las gzhan du 'dogs na ni des na bdag lus med cing sgrim ma mi dgos pa'i phyir nyes par 'gyur ro /
athāskandhakastena prakṛtyaiva muktasya kevalino mokṣārthaprayatnavaiyarthyamiti doṣaḥ gal te phung po med par 'dogs na ni /
rang bzhin gyis grol ba ma 'dres pa yin pas thar par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pa don med pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro /
vartamāne 'tītaprajñaptivaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ da ltar la 'das pa 'dogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni dpe'o /
taddhayatītaṃ vidyamānalakṣaṇatvena prajñapyamānaṃ vartamānalakṣaṇaṃ vā prajñapyeta vartamāne vā anyatra vā vartamānāt vartamānanirapekṣaṃ vā 'das pa de yod pa'i mtshan nyid kho nar 'dogs pa na de ltar gyi mtshan nyid du'am /
da ltar byung ba'am /
de ltar byung ngam sa gzhan du'am /
da ltar byung ba la mi ltos pa zhig tu gdags grang na /
tadyadi vartamānalakṣaṇaṃ tena vartamānamutpannāniruddhatallakṣaṇamatītamutpannā niruddhātmakamiti doṣaḥ de gal te da ltar gyi mtshan nyid du 'dogs na ni des na da ltar ni byung la ma 'gags pa yin pas de'i mtshan nyid 'das pa yang byung la ma 'gags pa'i mtshan nyid kyis nyes par 'gyur ro /
atha vartamāne tenāniruddhe niruddhātmakasya saṃbandho na yujyata iti doṣaḥ ji ste da ltar la 'dogs na des na ma 'gags pa ni 'gags pa'i bdag nyid dang 'brel bar mi rung bas nyes par 'gyur ro /
athānyatra vartamānāttena vartamānaṃ hitvā na kiṃcittadvastūpalabhyate yatra tatprajñapyata iti doṣaḥ ji ste da ltar las gzhan du 'dogs na ni des na da ltar bor na dngos po de ci yang mi dmigs te /
de la de 'dogs pa nyes par 'gyur ro /
atha vartamānanirapekṣaṃ tenāsaṃskṛtamapyatītaṃ prāpnotīti doṣaḥ ji ste da ltar la mi ltos na ni des na 'dus ma byas kyang 'das par 'gyur bas nyes par 'gyur ro /
taccātītaṃ bhraṣṭalakṣaṇatvāllakṣaṇato nāstīti siddham 'das pa de ni mtshan nyid nyams pa'i phyir mtshan nyid kyis med par grub bo /
ato 'nena vartamānaprajñaptau caturdoṣeṇa siddhenāsiddha ātmā nāstīti skandhaprajñaptau caturvidhadoṣopalaṃbhāt prasādhyate nāstīti de'i phyir da ltar la 'dogs pa la nyes pa bzhi grub pa 'dis /
bdag med pa ma grub pa yang phung po la 'dogs pa la nyes pa rnam pa bzhi dmigs pa'i phyir med par rab tu grub bo /
evamātmaviparyāsaṃ pratiṣidhyaitayaiva yuktyā nityādayo 'pi na santītyatideśa upanayaḥ de ltar bdag tu phyin ci log pa bkag nas rig pa 'dis rtag pa la sogs pa yang med do zhes 'dra bar ston pa ni nye bar sbyar ro /
yasmādetadevaṃ tasmādanityāḥ pañca skandhāḥ yāvadanātmāna iti nigamanamiti gang gi phyir de de ltar yin pa de'i phyir phung po lnga ni mi rtag pa nas bdag gi ba med pa'o zhes bya ba ni mjug sdud do /
pratyakṣaṃ svasatprakāśābhrānto 'rthaḥ /
tatra svo 'rthastadyathā cakṣuṣo rūpam 		mngon sum ni rang gi don yod cing snang la ma nor ba'o zhes bya ba de la rang gi don ni 'di lta ste /
mig gi gzugs so /
sadgrahaṇaṃ ghaṭādidravyāṇāṃ loke pratyakṣasaṃmatānāṃ pratyakṣatvavyudāsārtha prajñaptimātratvāt yod pa smos pa ni bum pa la sogs pa'i rdzas 'jig rten na mngon sum du grags pa rnams mngon sum ma yin pa gsal ba'i phyir te /
brtags pa tsam gyi phyir ro /
prakāśagrahaṇamāvṛtatvādibhiranupalabdhikāraṇairanābhāsagataviṣayavyudāsārtham snang ba smos pa ni bsgrib pa la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i rgyu rnams kyis mi snang bar 'gyur ba'i yul bsal ba'i phyir ro /
abhrāntagrahaṇamalātacakramāyāmarīcikādivyudāsārthamiti /
anumānaṃ pratyakṣaśiṣṭasaṃpratyayaḥ 		ma nor ba smos pa ni mgal me bskor ba dang sgyu ma dang smig rgyu la sogs pa bstsal ba'i phyir ro /
rjes su dpag pa ni mngon sum gyi lhag ma la yid ches pa'o zhes bya ba la /
pratyakṣādyadanyacchiṣṭamapratyakṣaṃ niyamena tatsahavarti prasiddhaṃ draṣṭuḥ pūrvaṃ tasya tatpratyakṣamīkṣamāṇasya tadanyasmin śiṣṭasaṃpratyaya utpadyate tenāpyatra bhavitavyametat sahavartineti tatpratyakṣapūrvakamanumānam mngon sum las gzhan pa gang yin pa ni lhag mthong mngon sum ma yin pa ste /
nges par de dang lhan cig gnas par mthong ba la sngar rab tu grub pa'o /
mngon sum de la de lta bas na de las gzhan la lhag ma la 'dir ni 'di de dang lhan cig gnas pa yin no zhes yid ches par 'gyur ba de mngon sum sngon du song ba'i rjes su dpag pa ste /
tadyathā dhūmaṃ paśyato 'gnāviti dper na du ba mthong ba la me lta bu'o /
āptāgamastadubhayāviruddhopadeśaḥ yid ches pa'i lung ni de gnyi ga dang mi 'gal bar ston pa ste /
yatropadeśe tatpratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca sarvathā na virudhyete na vyabhicarataḥ sa āptāgamaḥ saṃpratyayitvāt nye bar bstan pa gang la mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa de rnam pa thams cad du 'gal ba med cing 'khrul pa med pa ste /
yid ches pa'i lung ni yid ches par byed pa'i phyir ro /
vādālaṃkāro yena yukto vādī vādaṃ kurvāṇo 'tyarthaṃ śobhate smra ba'i rgyan ni gang dang ldan na smra ba smra bar byed pa'i tshe shin tu mdzes pa'o /
sa punaḥ svaparasamayajñatādiḥ de yang bdag dang gzhan gyi gzhung lugs shes pa la sogs pa ste /
tatra svaparasamayajñatā svasiddhāntaṃ parasiddhāntaṃ cārabhya granthataścārthataśca paurvāparyeṇa nirantaraṃ vyutpattiparipākaḥ de la bdag dang gzhan gyi gzhung lugs shes pa ni rang gi grub pa'i mtha' dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' las brtsams te /
tshig dang don snga phyi rgyun chags par rnam par ston par lcogs pa'o /
vākkaraṇasaṃpat śabdavādino vakṣyamāṇakathādoṣaviparyayeṇānākulādivāditā tshig zur phyin pa phun sum tshogs pa ni sgra smra ba 'og nas 'byung ba'i gtam gyis nyes pa las bzlog pa ste /
cal col la sogs pa med pa'i phyir ro /
vaiśāradyamanekodāhārābhiniviṣṭavidvajjanasamāvarte 'pi bruvato nirāsthatā gatavyathatā mi 'jigs pa ni du ma btsun pa dang mngon bar zhen pa can mkhas pa dag 'dus par smra zhing /
bag tsha ba med pa la 'dzem pa med pa'o /
sthairyaṃ prativādino vacanāvasānamāgamayyātvaramāṇabhāṣitā brtan pa ni phyir rgol ba'i tshig mjug tu phyin par bsdad nas yid dal du smra ba'o /
dākṣiṇyaṃ prakṛtibhadratā prāśnikaprativādicittānuvartitā mthun par byed pa ni rang bzhin gyis bzang bas gzu bo dang phyir rgol ba'i sems dang mthun pa'o /
vādanigraho yena vādī nigṛhīta ityucyate /
sa punaḥ kathātyāgādibhiḥ 		smra ba chad pas bcad pa ni gang gis smra ba chad pas bcad ces bya ba ste /
de yang gtam rjes bcad pa la sogs pa'o /
de la gtam rjes bcad pa la ni bdag gi ni ma legs so /
tatra kathātyāgo 'sādhu mama sādhu tavetyevamādibhiḥ prakāraiḥ svaparavādadoṣaguṇābhyupagamaḥ /
kathāsādo 'nyenānyapratisaraṇādibhiḥ vikṣepa ityarthaḥ /
yathoktaṃ sūtre āyuṣmāṃścundikastīrthikaiḥ saha vādaṃ kurvannavajānitvā pratijānāti pratijānitvāvajānātīti /
kathādoṣa ākulā divacanam /
tatra ākulaṃ yadadhikāramutsṛjya vicitrakathāpratānanam /
saṃrabdhaṃ yatkopoddhavaṃ dravoddhavam /
agamakaṃ yaddharmato 'rthataśca parṣadvādibhyāmagṛhītam /
amitaṃ yadadhikaṃ punaruktārthaṃ jñātārthaṃ ca /
anarthamanarthayuktam tatpañcākāraṃ draṣṭavyam /
nirarthakam apārthakam yuktibhinnam sādhyasamam jāticchalopasaṃhitam arthānupalabdhito 'saṃbaddhārthato 'naikāntikataḥ sādhanasyāpi sādhyato 'yoniśo 'sabhyasarvavādānugamataśca 		khyod kyi ni legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams kyis rang dang gzhan gyi smra ba'i skyon dang yon tan khas blang ba'o /
gtam 'phro lus pa ni gzhan nas gzhan du brgyud pa la sogs pas bskal ba'o /
gtam gyi nyes pa ni cal col la sogs pa'i tshig go /
de la cal col ni gang skabs bor te /
gtam sna tshogs rgyas par byed pa'o /
'khrugs pa ni gang khros pas gyeng ba dang dga' bas gyeng ba'o /
brda phrad du mi rung ba ni gang chos dang don 'khor dang phyir rgol ba rnams kyis ma zin pa'o /
ran pa ma yin pa ni gang tshig lhag ma dang zlos pa dang nyungs pa'o /
don dang ldan pa ma yin pa ni de rnam pa lngar ba lta bar bya ste /
don med pa dang don dang bral ba dang rigs pa dang bral ba dang sgrub par mtshungs pa dang ltag chod dang ldan pa ste /
don mi dmigs pa'i phyir ri /
don dang ma 'brel ba'i phyir ro /
ma nges pa'i phyir ro /
grub pa yang bsgrub dgos pa'i phyir ro /
tshul bzhin ma yin pa dang tshogs par 'byung ba ma yin pa dang smra ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir ro /
akālayuktavacanaṃ yatpūrvakaṃ vaktavyaṃpaścādabhihitam paścādvaktavyaṃ pūrvamabhihitam dus tshigs ma yin par smra ba ni gang sngar smra bar bya ba de phyis smra ba dang phyis smra bar bya ba de sngar smra bar bya'o /
asthiraṃ yatpratijñāyāvajñātamavajñāya pratijñātamatitvaramāṇayā vācā hi tūrṇaparāmṛṣṭaḥ mi rtag pa ni gang dam bcas nas smod pa dang smad nas yang dam 'cha' ba dang myur ches pas ha cang rtab rtab por gyur te mi gsal ba'o /
apradīptavacanaṃ yacchandalakṣaṇasamatikrāntamapratyanubhāṣyottaravihittam saṃskṛtenārabhya prākṛtenāvasitam prākṛtenārabhya saṃskṛtena paryavasitaṃ ca tshig mi gsal ba ni gang sgra'i mtshan nyid dang 'gal ba dang phyir ma bzlas par len smras pa dang legs par sbyar ba las brtsams te /
tha mal bas mthar phyung ba dang tha mal pa las brtsams te legs par sbyar bas mthar phyung ba'o /
aprabaddhaṃ yadantarādhiṣṭhitavicchinnaṃ vākpratibhānamiti /
vādaniḥsaraṇaṃ yena vādānniḥsarati akaraṇena vā guṇadoṣau vicārya vādasya nigrahasthānānāsādanāt karaṇena vā nirvahanāditi 		tshig rgyun chags pa ma yin pa ni /
gang bar skabs su tshig dang spobs pa thogs pa dang rgyun chad pa'o /
smra ba las byung ba ni gang gis smras pa las byung ba ste /
smra ba'i yon tan dang nyes pa brtags nas mi byed pas 'byung ba ni chad pa'i gnas su mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro /
tatra prativādinyabhājanatākuśalātsthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpayitumaśakyatā byed pas 'byung ba ni lcogs pa'i phyir ro /
de la phyir rgol ba snod ma yin pa ni mi dge ba'i gnas nas bslang ste /
dge ba'i gnas su gzhag par mi nus pa'o /
parṣado vaiguṇyamasabhyābhiniviṣṭapakṣapātitādinā 'khor yon tan med pa ni tshogs pa rung ba ma yin pa dang mngon par zhen pa can dang phyogs su lhung ba la sogs pa'o /
ātmano 'kauśalyaṃ vāde yāvadvādālaṅkāre 'vyutpattiḥ viparyayātprativādibhājanatādīni veditavyāni bdag kyang mi mkhas pa ni smra ba nas smra ba'i rgyan gyi bar la ma byang ba'o /
de las bzlog pa ni 'khor snod du gyur pa la sogs par rig par bya'o /
vāde bahukarā dharmā ye vāde 'vaśyamupayujyante smra ba la gces spras byed pa'i chos rnams ni gang dag smra ba rnams la gdon mi za bar dgos pa ste /
tadyathā svaparasamayajñatā vāde bahukaro dharmo yena sarvatra kathāvastuni vādaṃ karoti /
śeṣaṃ sugamam 		'di ltar gzhan gyi gzhung lugs la mkhas pa ni smra ba la gces spras byed pa'i chos te /
des gtam gyi gzhi thams cad du smra bar byed do /
lhag ma rnams ni go sla bsam bshad do /
kuśalapakṣaprayuktenetyuktvā pratipattisārakeṇeti vacanamāśayaviśuddhijñāpanārthaṃ na lābhasatkārādinimittaṃ śrutādikuśalapakṣe prayuktenetyarthaḥ dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba gsungs nas nan tan snying por byed pa zhes bka' stsal pa ni bsam pa rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i phyir te /
rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sogs pa'i rgyur thos pa la sogs pa dge ba'i phyogs la brtson pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
sattvasaṃgrāhakeṇeti śrāvakādiviśeṣaṇārthaṃ parahitapratipattipradhānenetyarthaḥ sems can bsdus pa ni nyan thos la sogs pa las bye brag tu bya ba'i phyir te /
gzhan la phan par sgrub pa lhur len ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /
evaṃ ca svahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyata ityayameṣāṃ padānāmanusaṃdhirveditavyaḥ de ltar bdag la phan ba dang gzhan la phan par zhugs pa ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba zhes bya ba 'di ni tshig 'di dag gi mtshams sbyar bar rig par bya'o /
avigṛhyāpi tāvadvāde kriyamāṇe prakṛtigambhīratvānmahāyānadharmasya durlabhājñā prāgeva vigṛhya mi rtsod par smra bar byed du zin kyang theg pa chen po'i chos ni rang bzhin gyis zab pa'i phyir kun shes pa dkon na rtsod pas lta smos kyang ci dgos /
yaiśca saha vigṛhya vādaḥ kriyate te 'pi pratipattāro nājñābhiprāyāḥ pratibruvanti kiṃtarhyupālambhābhiprāyāḥ gang dag dang lhan cig tu rtsod pas smra bar bya ba'i phyir /
smra ba de dag kun shes par bya ba'i bsam pas phyir smra ba ma yin gyi skyon gdags pa'i bsam pas so /
yeṣvapi prāśnikeṣu sa vādaḥ kriyate te vāsabhyā avyutpannā vā bhavantyabhiniviṣṭā vā gzu bo gang dag gi mdun du de smra bar bya ba'i tshogs de dag kyang rung ba ma yin zhing bya ba ma yin pa'am /
mngon bar zhen pa can dag go /
sarvo 'pi ca vādā prāyeṇa ṣaḍbhirdoṣairyukto bhavati smra bar bya ba thams cad kyang phal cher nyes pa drug dang ldan pa yin te /
tathāhi vādaṃ kurvāṇaḥ kadācidatirabhasenāsatpakṣamapi parigṛhyābhiniveśena chalajātinigrahasthānānyapi prayukte /
vacanaparyavasānamanigamayyāpyakālena vaktumārabhate /
samyagapyuktāṃ prativādinaḥ kathāmapapātayati paṃsayatītyarthaḥ 		'di ltar smra bar byed pa na yang res 'ga' byung rgyal du phyogs ngan pa yang yongs su bzung nas mngon bar zhen pa dang tshig dor dang ltag chod dang chad pa'i gnas rnams la yang sbyor ba dang tshig mjug tu phyin phyin du mi sdong par dus ma yin par smra bar rtsom pa dang phyir rgol bas legs par smras kyang khyad du gsod de smod ces bya ba'i tha tshig go /
paruṣamapi bruvate yena prativādyādayaḥ cittaṃ pradūṣayanti /
svayaṃ ca teṣu cittaṃ pradūṣayatītyebhiḥ ṣaḍbhirdoṣairyukto bhavati 		tshig brlang po yang smra ba ste /
des phyir rgol ba la sogs pa'i sems 'khrugs par byed pa dang bdag kyang de dag la sems 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i nyes pa 'di drug dang ldan pa yin no /
upaśāntasya ca durlabho vādaḥ nye bar zhi ba ni smra ba dkon no /
sati cānupaśame durlabhaṃ paracittānurakṣaṇaṃ svacittānurakṣaṇaṃ ca yena pare prasādaṃ labheran vimuktyāyatanayogena svacittaṃ samādhīyate nye bar ma zhi ba la ni gang gis gzhan dad pa thob par 'gyur ba dang rnam par grol ba'i gnas dang ldan pa dang rang gi sems mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ba dang gzhan gyi sems bsrung ba dang rang gi sems bsrung ba gnyi ga dkon no /
prāyeṇa vāde kathamahaṃ jayeyaṃ pare parājīyerannityevaṃ cittaṃ samudācarati smra ba phal cher ni ji ltar na bdag rgyal bar 'gyur zhing pha rol pham par 'gyur snyam pa'i sems de kun du 'byung ngo /
sati ca tasmin paridāhaduḥkhasaṃkleśaḥ /
tasminsatyasparśavihāraḥ 		de yod na yongs su gdung pa'i sdug bsngal gyis kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ro /
de yod na bde ba la gnas par mi 'gyur ro /
tato nirantarakuśalapakṣaprayogāsāmarthyāttato viśeṣādhigamaṃ pratyaprāptiparihāṇiriti de'i phyir rgyun mi chad par dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor bar mi nus so /
de'i phyir khyad par thob par bya ba la ma thob pas yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro /
mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hatvā ityasyāṃ gāthāyāṃ loke yadatyarthamavadyaṃ pātakaṃ tadabhidhāyīnyakṣarāṇyetāni viśuddhau pariṇāmitāni pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing /
zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni 'jig rten na gang shin tu kha na ma thob sdig tor rtsi ba da brjod pa'i yi ge rnams rnam par dag par yongs su bsgyur ba'o /
kiṃ ca loke 'tyarthamavadyaṃ saṃmatam /
gurujanaghāto mahājanaghātaśca 		'jig rten na shin tu kha na ma tho bar grags pa ni skye bo bla ma bsad pa dang skye bo chen po bsad pa'o /
sa punargurujano dvividhaḥ pratiniyato lokasādhāraṇaśca skye bo bla ma de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
so sor nges pa dang 'jig rten dang thun mong ba'o /
lokasādhāraṇo 'pi punardvividhaḥ paripālako dakṣiṇīyaśca 'jig rten dang thun mong ba la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
yongs su skyong bar byed pa dang sbyin gnas so /
tatra pratiniyato gurujano mātā pitā ca pālako rājā dakṣiṇīyaḥ śrotriyabrāhmaṇāḥ teṣāṃ śuddhatarasamatatvāt de la so sor nges pa'i skye bo bla ma ni pha dang ma'o /
skyong bar byed pa ni rgyal po'o /
sbyin gnas ni bram ze gtsang sbra can rnams te /
tadeṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ ghāto gurujanaghāta ityucyate de dag ni shin tu dag par grags pa'i phyir ro /
de dag thams cad bsad na ni skye bo bla ma bsad pa zhes bya'o /
mahājanaghāto rāṣṭrasya sānucarasya ghātaḥ skye bo chen po bsad pa ni yul 'khor 'khor dang bcas bcom nas zhes bya ba'o /
anucarāḥ punaḥ gavāśvamahiṣoṣṭrādayo veditavyāḥ /
kathaṃ punaretānyakṣarāṇi viśuddhau pariṇāmyante 		'khor ni ba lang dang rta dang rnga mo dang ma he la sogs par rig par bya'o /
ji ltar yi ge 'di dag dag par yongs su bsgyur zhen /
mātrādighātavacanasya tṛṣṇādiprahāṇapariṇāmanādyathākramaṃ tṛṣṇām karmabhavam sopādānaṃ vijñānam dṛṣṭiśīlavrataparāmarśadvayam ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ca sagocaramadhikṛtya mātrādayo draṣṭavyāḥ tatsādharmyāt ma la sogs pa bsad pa'i tshig ni sred pa la sogs pa spong bar yongs su bsgyur ba'i phyir te /
go rims bzhin du sred pa dang las kyi sred pa dang nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa dang lta ba dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa gnyis dang skye mched drug spyod yul dang bcas pa'i dbang du byas nas /
ma la sogs par blta bar bya ste /
tatra tṛṣṇā nirvṛttihetuḥ /
karmabhava utpattihetuḥ 		de dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro /
de la sred pa ni mngon par grub pa'i rgyu'o /
las kyi srid pa ni skye ba'i rgyu ste /
sa ca bhāvanābījāghānayogena pitṛbhūto draṣṭavyaḥ de ni bsgom pa'i bag chags skyed pa'i tshul gyis pha lta bur blta bar bya'o /
ābhyāṃ hetubhyāṃ sopādānaṃ vijñānaṃ pravartate /
tasyaivaṃ pravartamānasya satyapi mokṣābhilāṣe mokṣaprāptivighnakarāvanupāyāgraśuddhipratyāyakau parāmarśau 		rgyu 'di gnyis las ni nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo /
de de ltar byung na thar pa 'dod du zin kyang mchog tu dag par yid ches par byed pa'i mchog tu 'dzin pa gnyis thar pa thob pa la gegs byed do /
śrotriyasādharmyamanayoretadeva veditavyaṃ yadutāgraśuddhayabhiniveśaḥ /
tasyaiva punarvijñānasyāśrayālaṃbanabhāvena ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sagocaraṃ veditavyamiti 		'di gnyis gtsang sbra can dang 'dra ba ni 'di lta bur rig par bya ste /
'di ltar mchog dang 'dag par mngon bar zhen pa'o /
rnam par shes pa de'i gnas dang dmigs pa'i dngos pos skye mched drug spyod yul dang bcas par rig par bya'o /
aśrāddhaścākṛtajñaścetyasyāṃ gāthāyāṃ hīnārthābhidhāyīnyakṣarāṇyuttamārthe paridīpitāni /
hīno loke caturvidhaḥ manaskarmahīnaḥ kāyakarmahīno vākkarmahīna upabhogahīnaśca /
manaskarmahīnaḥ punardvividhaḥ kuśalapravṛttivailomyena cāśrāddhaḥ paralokādyasaṃpratyayena dānādiṣvaprayogāt 		yid mi ches dang byas mi gzo /
zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di ni /
don ngan pa brjod pa'i yi ge rnams mchog gi don du yongs su bsgyur ba'o /
'jig rten na ngan pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
yid kyi las ngan pa dang lus kyi las ngan pa dang ngag gi las ngan pa dang longs spyod ngan pa'o /
yid kyi las ngan pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
dge ba la 'jug pa dang mi mthun pas yid mi ches pa ste /
'jig rten pa rol la sogs pa la yid mi ches pas /
sbyin pa la sogs pa la mi sbyor ba'i phyir ro /
akuśalapravṛttyānukūlyena cākṛtajñaḥ yatropakārānapekṣitvena mātṛvadhādiduścarite nirmaryādatvāt /
kāyakarmahīnaścauraḥ saṃdhicchedakaḥ atyarthaṃ garhitajīvitatvāt 		mi dge ba la 'jug pa dang mthun pas byas pa mi gzo ba ste /
sngon phan btags pa la mi lta bar ma gsod pa la sogs pas nyes par spyod pa la yang mi 'dogs pa'i phyir ro /
lus kyi las ngan pa ni khyim 'bigs pa'i rkun po ste /
'tsho ba shin tu smad pa'i phyir ro /
vākkarmahīno mṛṣāvādādipradhānaḥ tadrūpasya sabhādiṣu praveśābhāvāt /
upabhogahī naḥ śvā kā kaḥ preto vetyevamādikaḥ charditabhakṣaṇāditi 		ngag gi las ngan pa ni brdzun du smra ba la sogs pa lhur len pa ste /
de lta bu dang ldan pa ni tshogs pa la sogs pa'i nang du 'jug tu mi rung ba'i phyir ro /
longs spyod ngan pa ni /
khyi dang bya rog dang yi nga gas la sogs pa ste /
kathaṃ punaretānyakṣarāṇyuttamārthe pariṇāmyante skyugs pa za ba'i phyir ro /
ji ltar yi ge 'di dag mchog gi don du yongs su bsgyur zhe na /
aśrāddhādivacanānāmarhati pariṇāmanāt yid mi ches pa la sogs pa'i tshig rnams ni dgra bcom par yongs su bsgyur ba'i phyir ro /
tatrāśrāddho vimuktijñānadarśanayogena svapratyayatvāt de la yid mi ches pa ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang ldan pas rang gi yid ches pa'i phyir ro /
akṛtajño 'saṃskṛtanirmāṇajñānāt byas pa mi gzo ba ni 'dus ma byas pa mya ngan las 'das pa shes pa'i phyir ro /
saṃdhicchettā punarbhavapratisaṃdhihetukleśaprahāṇāt khyim 'bigs par byed pa ni yang srid par nying mtshams sbyor ba'i rgyu nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir ro /
hatāvakāśa āyatyāṃ sarvagatiṣu duḥkhānabhinirvartanāt go skabs bcom zhes bya ba ni /
phyi ma la 'gro pa thams cad du sdug bsngal mngon par mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro /
vāntāśo dṛṣṭe dharme upakaraṇabalena kāyaṃ saṃdhā rayato 'pi bhogajīvitāśābhāvāditi /
yathā coktam asāre sāramataya iti 		skyugs pa za ba ni mthong ba'i chos la yo byad kyi stobs kyis lus 'dzin kyang longs spyod dang srog la re ba med pa'i phyir ro /
snying po med la snying por shes /
asyā gāthāyāḥ pūrvavadarthanirdeśo draṣṭavyaḥ zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di'i don snga ma bzhin du bshad par bya'o /
śarīraṃ punarasyāḥ samādhiṃ niśritya bodhisattvā darśanabhāvanāmārgābhyāṃ mahābodhiṃ spṛśantīti 'di'i lus ni byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la brten nas mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam gnyis kyis byang chub chen po la reg pa'o /
mātsaryadharmatāmanuvṛṃhayatīti savāsanamātsaryānuśayaprahāṇena tattathatāśrayaparivṛttisākṣātkaraṇāt ser sna'i chos nyid 'phel bar byed pa ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i sems ser sna'i bag la nyal spangs pas de'i de bzhin nyid gnas gyur pa mngon du byed pa'i phyir ro /
dānena ca parikhidyate dīrghakālaṃ dānanimittaṃ paramaduṣkaraśramābhyupagamāt sbyin pas yongs su skyo ba ni yun ring por sbyin pa'i rgyu mchog tu bya dka' bas ngal bar bya ba khas blangs pa'i phyir ro /
yācanakaṃ ca dveṣṭi svayaṃ grāhābhirucitatayā yācanakaprātikūlyāt slong ba la tshig pa za ba ni rang gis len par 'dod pas slong ba dang mi mthun pa'i phyir ro /
na kiṃcit kadāciddadāti sarvasya vastunaḥ sarvadā dānāt res 'ga' ni ci yang sbyin par mi byed pa ni dngos po thams cad rtag tu sbyin pa'i phyir ro /
dūre ca bhavati dānasya āsādyadānādiparivarjanāt sbyin pa las ring du gyur pa ni nye ba la sbyin pa la sogs pa yongs su spangs pa'i phyir ro /
tatra parameṇa brahmacaryeṇa samanvāgata iti lokottareṇa mārgeṇetyarthaḥ tshangs par spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni /
'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam dang ldan zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
nānyatra maithunānmaithunasya niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣata iti tasyaiva yathābhūta parijñānena tatprahāṇāt 'khrig pa las gzhan du 'khrig pas nges par 'byung ba mi 'tshol ba ni de nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes nas spong ba'i phyir ro /
yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ punarasya tathatāpratibedhādveditavyam de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa ni /
de'i de bzhin nyid rab tu rtogs par rig par bya'o /
maithunaprahāṇenopekṣako bhavati abrahmacaryaprahāṇopekṣaṇāt 'khrig pa spong ba la gyeng ba ni mi tshangs par spyod pa spong ba'i thabs la rtog pa'i phyir ro /
utpannaṃ ca maithunarāgamadhivāsayati kāmarāgasyādhyātmamutpannasya bahiḥpravāsanāt 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags skyes pa dang du len pa ni /
'dod pa la 'dod chags nang du skyes pa phyi rol du spong ba'i phyir ro /
maithunapratipakṣeṇa ca dharmeṇottrasyati tatpratipakṣeṇa mārgeṇa sarvasattvottaraṇāya vyavasyatīti kṛtvā 'khrig pa'i gnyen po'i chos kyis skrag pa ni de'i gnyen po'i chos kyis sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i don du rtsol ba'i phyir ro /
rgyun mi 'chad par gnyis kyis gnyis sbyor ba ni /
abhīkṣṇaṃ ca dvayadvayaṃ samāpadyate saṃkleśavyavada nadvayena phalahetubhedena catuḥsatyātmakena śamathavipaśyanādvayena /
punaḥpunarlaukikalokottaramārgadvayaṃ samāpadyata iti kṛtvā 		zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ba gnyis kyis 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa gnyis la snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba gnyis kyis 'bras bu dang rgyu'i bye brag gis bden pa bzhi'i bdag nyid du gyur pa'i don du 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gnyis la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir ro /
kimupādāyedaṃ śāstramabhidharmasamuccaya iti nāma labhate bstan bcos 'di ci'i phyir chos mngon par kun las btus pa zhes bya bar ming btags she na /
niruktinyāyena /
sametyoccayatāmupādāya tattvamabhisametyādhigamya bodhisattvaṃḥ saṃkalanādityarthaḥ /
samantāduccayatāmupādāyābhidharmasūtrataḥ sarvacintāsthānasaṃgrahādityarthaḥ /
samyaguccayatvāyāyatanatāṃ copādāyetyaviparītenopāyena yāvadbuddhatvaprāpaṇādityarthaḥ /
ityabhidharmasamuccaye bhāṣyataḥ sāṃkathyaviniścayo nāma pañcamaḥ samuccayaḥ samāptaḥ 		nges pa'i tshig gi tshul gyis rtogs nas bsdus pa'i phyir te /
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis de kho na nyid mngon par rtogs shing khong du chud nas mdor bsdus zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
kun las btus pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni chos mngon pa'i mdo rnams las te /
bsam pa'i gnas thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
yang dag par mtho ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du thob par byed pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go /
chos mngon pa kun las btus pa'i bshad pa /
slob dpon chen po rgyal ba'i sras kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
